languages.text: "Образец, склонный к техноманиакальным компульсиям? Он называл это имя на допросе". {n}Гемункул довольно перебирает лезвиями-пальцами, словно насекомое лапками.{/n} "Работать с ним было любопытно. Он так... сопротивлялся моим улучшениям. Но потом образец впал в депрессивное состояние, я утратил к нему интерес и вышвырнул в Прорву. Дурной образец, наверное, он уже сдох на улицах".

"The specimen prone to technomaniacal compulsions? He did reveal that name during his interrogation." {n}The Haemonculus twitches his spindly blade-fingers in the way an insect moves its legs.{/n} "Working on him was a curious process. He resisted my enhancements with such intensity... But then the specimen fell into depression, so I lost interest and cast him into the Chasm. A flawed specimen. He must surely be dead by now."
languages.original_text: "Образец, склонный к техноманиакальным компульсиям? Он называл это имя на допросе". {n}Гемункул довольно перебирает лезвиями-пальцами, словно насекомое лапками.{/n} "Работать с ним было любопытно. Он так... сопротивлялся моим улучшениям. Но потом образец впал в депрессивное состояние, я утратил к нему интерес и вышвырнул в Прорву. Дурной образец, наверное, он уже сдох на улицах".

traits.locale_text: "The specimen prone to technomaniacal compulsions? He did reveal the name during his interrogation." {n}The Haemonculus moves his spindly blade-fingers like an insect moves its legs.{/n} "Working on him was a curious process.. He was resisting my enhancements with such intensity... But then the specimen fell into a depressed state, so I lost my interest in him and cast him out into the Chasm. A flawed specimen. He must be dead by now."

"The specimen prone to technomaniacal compulsions? He resisted my enhancements with such intensity... But then the specimen fell into depression, so I lost interest and cast him into the Chasm. A flawed specimen. He must surely be dead by now."

languages.text: « Le spécimen aux compulsions technomaniaques ? Il m'a indiqué son nom lors de l'interrogatoire. » {n}L'hémoncule agite ses doigts grêles et acérés dans un mouvement rappelant celui d'un insecte.{/n} « Travailler sur son corps était pour le moins étrange. Il résistait à toutes mes améliorations avec une force incroyable... Mais une fois tombé en dépression, il n'était plus digne de mon intérêt et je l'ai envoyé dans l'Abîme. Un spécimen déficient. Il doit être mort, à l'heure qu'il est. »
languages.original_text: "The specimen prone to technomaniacal compulsions? He did reveal that name during his interrogation." {n}The Haemonculus twitches his spindly blade-fingers in the way an insect moves its legs.{/n} "Working on him was a curious process. He resisted my enhancements with such intensity... But then the specimen fell into depression, so I lost interest and cast him into the Chasm. A flawed specimen. He must surely be dead by now."

traits.locale_text: « Le spécimen aux compulsions technomaniaques ? Il m'a indiqué son nom lors de l'interrogatoire. » {n}L'hémoncule agite ses doigts grêles et acérés dans un mouvement rappelant celui d'un insecte.{/n} « Travailler sur son corps était pour le moins étrange. Il résistait à toutes mes améliorations avec une force incroyable... Mais une fois tombé en dépression, il n'était plus digne de mon intérêt et je l'ai envoyé dans l'Abîme. Un spécimen déficient. Il doit être mort, à l'heure qu'il est. »

languages.text: “就是那个很容易得技术强迫症的实验对象吗？审讯他的时候，他确实提到了这个名字。”{n}血伶人抽动着他那如刀刃般锋利的手指，就像虫子蹬腿一样。{/n}“他的改造过程很有趣，他极其坚决地抵制我的强化技术……但后来，他陷入了抑郁状态。于是我便失去了兴趣，把他丢进了裂隙。那个实验对象有缺陷，他现在肯定已经死了。”
languages.original_text: "The specimen prone to technomaniacal compulsions? He did reveal that name during his interrogation." {n}The Haemonculus twitches his spindly blade-fingers in the way an insect moves its legs.{/n} "Working on him was a curious process. He resisted my enhancements with such intensity... But then the specimen fell into depression, so I lost interest and cast him into the Chasm. A flawed specimen. He must surely be dead by now."

traits.locale_text: “就是那个很容易得技术强迫症的实验对象吗？审讯他的时候，他确实提到了这个名字。”{n}血伶人抽动着他那如刀刃般锋利的手指，就像虫子蹬腿一样。{/n}“他的改造过程很有趣，他极其坚决地抵制我的强化技术……但后来，他陷入了抑郁状态。于是我便失去了兴趣，把他丢进了裂隙。那个实验对象有缺陷，他现在肯定已经死了。”

languages.text: "Das Versuchsstück, das zu technomanischen Zwängen neigt? Er hat diesen Namen während seines Verhörs preisgegeben." {n}Der Haemonculus lässt seine dürren Klingenfinger zucken, wie ein Insekt seine Beine bewegt.{/n} "Die Arbeit an ihm war ein merkwürdiger Prozess. Er hat sich mit meinen Verbesserungen mit einer solchen Intensität widersetzt ... Doch dann verfiel das Versuchsstück in eine Depression, da habe ich das Interesse verloren und ihn in die Kluft geworfen. Ein mangelhaftes Versuchsstück. Er ist inzwischen gewiss tot."
languages.original_text: "The specimen prone to technomaniacal compulsions? He did reveal that name during his interrogation." {n}The Haemonculus twitches his spindly blade-fingers in the way an insect moves its legs.{/n} "Working on him was a curious process. He resisted my enhancements with such intensity... But then the specimen fell into depression, so I lost interest and cast him into the Chasm. A flawed specimen. He must surely be dead by now."

traits.locale_text: "Das Versuchsstück, das zu technomanischen Zwängen neigt? Er hat diesen Namen während seines Verhörs preisgegeben." {n}Der Haemonculus lässt seine dürren Klingenfinger zucken, wie ein Insekt seine Beine bewegt.{/n} "Die Arbeit an ihm war ein merkwürdiger Prozess. Er hat sich mit meinen Verbesserungen mit einer solchen Intensität widersetzt ... Doch dann verfiel das Versuchsstück in eine Depression, da habe ich das Interesse verloren und ihn in die Kluft geworfen. Ein mangelhaftes Versuchsstück. Er ist inzwischen gewiss tot."

languages.text: «¿El espécimen proclive a compulsiones tecnomaníacas? Así dijo que se llamaba durante el interrogatorio». {n}El Hemónculo hace crujir sus larguiruchos dedos con forma de cuchilla al igual que un insecto moviendo sus patas.{/n} «Ha sido interesante trabajar con él. Opuso bastante resistencia frente a mis mejoras... Pero luego cayó en un estado depresivo, perdí el interés en él y lo envié al Abismo. Era un espécimen defectuoso. Lo más seguro es que ya haya muerto».
languages.original_text: "The specimen prone to technomaniacal compulsions? He did reveal that name during his interrogation." {n}The Haemonculus twitches his spindly blade-fingers in the way an insect moves its legs.{/n} "Working on him was a curious process. He resisted my enhancements with such intensity... But then the specimen fell into depression, so I lost interest and cast him into the Chasm. A flawed specimen. He must surely be dead by now."

traits.locale_text: «¿El espécimen proclive a compulsiones tecnomaníacas? Así dijo que se llamaba durante el interrogatorio». {n}El Hemónculo hace crujir sus larguiruchos dedos con forma de cuchilla al igual que un insecto moviendo sus patas.{/n} «Ha sido interesante trabajar con él. Opuso bastante resistencia frente a mis mejoras... Pero luego cayó en un estado depresivo, perdí el interés en él y lo envié al Abismo. Era un espécimen defectuoso. Lo más seguro es que ya haya muerto».

languages.text: 「技術マニアな強迫観念にとらわれやすい標本だと？彼は尋問中にその名を明かした」{n}ハモンキュラスは、昆虫が足を動かすように、とがった刃物のような指をぴくぴくと動かす。{/n}「彼の研究は興味深いプロセスだった。私の増強に激しく抵抗した…だが、その標本がうつ病になったため、私は興味を失い、彼を裂け目に投げ込んだ。欠陥のある標本だ。もう死んでいるに違いない」
languages.original_text: "The specimen prone to technomaniacal compulsions? He did reveal that name during his interrogation." {n}The Haemonculus twitches his spindly blade-fingers in the way an insect moves its legs.{/n} "Working on him was a curious process. He resisted my enhancements with such intensity... But then the specimen fell into depression, so I lost interest and cast him into the Chasm. A flawed specimen. He must surely be dead by now."

traits.locale_text: 「技術マニアな強迫観念にとらわれやすい標本だと？彼は尋問中にその名を明かした」{n}ハモンキュラスは、昆虫が足を動かすように、とがった刃物のような指をぴくぴくと動かす。{/n}「彼の研究は興味深いプロセスだった。私の増強に激しく抵抗した…だが、その標本がうつ病になったため、私は興味を失い、彼を裂け目に投げ込んだ。欠陥のある標本だ。もう死んでいるに違いない」

languages.text: "Teknomanyakça davranışlara eğilimli olan numune mi? Sorgulaması sırasında ismini vermişti." {n}Haimonkulus bıçaklı ve ince parmaklarını, bacaklarını hareket ettiren bir böcek edasıyla oynatıyor.{/n} "Onun üzerinde çalışmak ilginç bir deneyimdi. Numune, geliştirmelerime büyük bir dirayet gösterdi ancak ardından depresyona sürüklendi ve ben de ilgimi yitirerek onu Yarık'a attım. Kusurlu bir numune. Şimdiye kadar ölmüş olmalı."
languages.original_text: "The specimen prone to technomaniacal compulsions? He did reveal that name during his interrogation." {n}The Haemonculus twitches his spindly blade-fingers in the way an insect moves its legs.{/n} "Working on him was a curious process. He resisted my enhancements with such intensity... But then the specimen fell into depression, so I lost interest and cast him into the Chasm. A flawed specimen. He must surely be dead by now."
